content: video here - https //www instagram com/reel/danskswi1f2/ igsh=dw41oxnyotbkandj and here https //www instagram com/reel/danlal8olz4/ igsh=yty1ymezethibxp6 1 little lighted up knitted decorations - so many uses for these they do turn on and off too the light within is an led balloon light - available almost everywhere i should imagine amazon or light in the box sell them in the uk and us the knitting itself is simple enough and a sure way to use up your stash i ve suggested knitting them in the round but i ve also included a flat knitted-version if on dpns is not for you as well as the balloon light and your yarn and needles you ll need some glue and that s it hope you enjoy making them - apologies if it s a new obsession for you claire x 1 https //www instagram com/reel/danlal8olz4/ igsh=yty1ymezethibxp6
